text: Colobothea declivis is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Per Olof Christopher Aurivillius in 1902 and is known from Bolivia.BioLib.cz - Colobothea declivis. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Colobotheini Category:Beetles described in 1902 Category:Beetles of South America
title: Colobothea declivis
